product_name: REI Tech-Compatible Oslo Grip Gloves - 2012 Overstock
long_description: Operate your touch-screen cell phone while you're walking the dog or taking a break from cross-country skiing with the REI Tech-Compatible Oslo Grip gloves. Warm polyester/wool blend wicks perspiration and dries fast. Tech-compatible forefinger and thumb threads allow you to operate touch-screen devices without taking the gloves off. Synthetic leather palms are durable and grip well, even in wet conditions. REI Tech-Compatible Oslo Grip gloves have elastic at the wrists that fits comfortably and seals out cold air. Overstock.
short_description: Operate your touch-screen cell phone while you're walking the dog or taking a break from cross-country skiing with the REI Tech-Compatible Oslo Grip gloves.
